explanation_of_expression: The word '일' refers to a specific day or date.
image_description0: Imagine a calendar with a circle around a particular day, representing '일'. The calendar is marked with other dates, but this one stands out as the focus.
image_description1: In this image, the word '일' is highlighted in bold and vibrant colors, drawing attention to its significance as a specific day or date.
image_description2: Visualize a calendar with a magnifying glass zooming in on a specific day, symbolizing the concept of '일' as a particular date.

image_description0: In the image, there is a single red apple on a white background. The apple represents the concept of 'one' or 'single'.
image_description1: Imagine a bold and prominent number '1' written in red color. The number represents the concept of 'one' or 'single'.
image_description2: The image shows a single red dot on a white background. The dot represents the concept of 'one' or 'single'.
explanation_of_syllables: 일 - one (it represents the concept of 'one' or 'single')
sentence_example: 오늘은 일이 많아요. (Today, I have a lot of work.)

image_description0: In the image, there is a calendar with different months marked on it. Each month is represented by a different color, showing the passage of time.
image_description1: Imagine a colorful calendar with different months written on it. The word '달' is highlighted in bold letters, emphasizing its meaning as 'month'.
image_description2: The image shows a calendar with the word '달' written on it. The calendar is marked with different colors to represent different months.
sentence_example: 오늘은 7월의 첫 날입니다. (Today is the first day of July.)

image_description0: Imagine a cake that has been cut in half, with one half on a plate and the other half still on the cake stand. The plate with the half cake represents the concept of '반' or 'half'.
image_description1: Imagine a scale with two equal weights on each side. The scale is perfectly balanced, symbolizing the idea of '반' or 'half'.
image_description2: Imagine a circle that has been divided into two equal halves. One half is shaded in, representing the concept of '반' or 'half'.
explanation_of_syllables: 반 - half (it represents the concept of something being divided into two equal parts)
sentence_example: 저는 반만 먹었어요. (I only ate half.)

explanation_of_expression: The moon is a celestial body that orbits around the Earth.
image_description0: In the image, there is a round object in the sky that emits a soft, gentle light. It illuminates the darkness of the night and creates a peaceful atmosphere.
image_description1: Imagine a serene night scene with a beautiful round object shining brightly in the sky. Its soft light creates a tranquil ambiance and adds a touch of magic to the surroundings.
image_description2: The image depicts a clear night sky with a glowing round object suspended in the darkness. Its gentle radiance casts a serene glow over the landscape, creating a peaceful and enchanting atmosphere.
sentence_example: 오늘 밤에 달이 아름답게 빛나고 있어요. (The moon is shining beautifully tonight.)

explanation_of_expression: A round object used in various sports and games
image_description0: A round object made of rubber or leather, used in sports like soccer and basketball. It can bounce and be thrown or kicked.
image_description1: Imagine a round object made of rubber or leather, used in sports like soccer and basketball. It can bounce and be thrown or kicked.
image_description2: A round object made of rubber or leather, used in sports like soccer and basketball. It can bounce and be thrown or kicked.
explanation_of_syllables: 공 - sphere (it represents a round object),
sentence_example: 나는 공을 던져서 친구와 함께 놀았어요. (I threw the ball and played with my friend.)

explanation_of_expression: A collection of people or things that are gathered together for a specific purpose.
image_description0: A group of objects, such as books, pencils, and notebooks, arranged neatly on a desk. The objects are organized and ready for use.
image_description1: In a brightly lit room, a collection of objects, including books, pencils, and notebooks, are neatly arranged on a desk. The objects are the center of attention and represent a focused and productive environment.
image_description2: A simple image that represents a class or group is a circle with various objects, such as books, pencils, and notebooks, arranged around it. The circle symbolizes unity and collaboration.
explanation_of_syllables: 반 - half (it represents a division or part of a whole)
sentence_example: 오늘은 반에서 친구들과 함께 공부했어요. (Today, I studied with my friends in class.)

explanation_of_expression: 영 is the sino-Korean word for zero, used in mathematics.
image_description0: In this image, there is a circle with nothing inside it, representing the concept of zero. The circle is surrounded by other numbers, emphasizing the absence of value in 영.
image_description1: Imagine a blackboard with various mathematical equations written on it. Among the numbers and symbols, there is a large, bold 영, symbolizing zero and its significance in mathematics.
image_description2: The image shows a calculator screen displaying the number 영, indicating zero. The screen is surrounded by other numbers, highlighting the unique value of 영 in mathematical calculations.
explanation_of_syllables: 영 - zero (it represents the concept of nothingness or absence of value)
sentence_example: 오늘 수학 시험에서 영점을 받았어요. (Today, I got a zero on the math exam.)

explanation_of_expression: The word '공' in this context refers to the number zero, often used in telephone numbers.
image_description0: Imagine a telephone keypad with the number zero highlighted. It represents the concept of zero or nothingness.
image_description1: In this image, the number zero is emphasized and stands out. It symbolizes the absence of any value or quantity.
image_description2: The image shows a telephone with the number zero displayed prominently on the screen. It represents the concept of zero or nothingness in the context of telephone numbers.
explanation_of_syllables: The syllable '공' in '공' does not have a specific meaning in this context.
sentence_example: 전화번호에는 공이 들어가지 않아요. (There is no zero in the phone number.)
